experience.description: Fundraise and M&A advisory for early and growth-stage technology-driven businesses. We work with select businesses and partner with them across their lifecycle for strategic transactions and beyond that. We filter these aggressively to add maximum value for our clients as well as the VCs we work with. Our team brings in the best practices of Bulge Bracket Investment Banks and the agility that the new-age companies need. Some of the sectors that we have worked in are Edtech, Gaming, Fintech, Consumer Brands, eCommerce, HealthTech, B2B Manufacturing etc.
